description.value:
You always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Artillerist Spells table. These spells count as Artificer spells for you, but they do not count against the number of Artificer spells you prepare.

Artillerist Spells
Artificer LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplScorchingR]{Scorching Ray}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShatter000]{Shatter}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFireball00]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWindWall00]{Wind Wall}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWallOfFire]{Wall of Fire}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDestructiv]{Destructive Wave}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWallOfForc]{Wall of Force}
